title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility        NPS Photo   Â    Virtually all of Glen Canyon's land-based facilities are accessible. Some water based facilities (i.e. docks, marinas, launch ramps, etc.) will require some assistance. Marinas, operated by park concessioners Aramark and Antelope Point Holdings, will provide visitors with assistance onto the docks and to their vessels. Call 928.645.1030 for assitance. Lodging and eating facilities within the park are accessible. Park concessioners offer a limited number of houseboat rentals that are accessible.
